nsfwtag-pref: Label for NSFW preference in Special:Preferences
nsfwtag-prefeditor: Label for a preference that adds a Show NSFW tags toggle when previewing a page
nsfwtag-header: Message inserted above content when it contains a nsfw tag/function or sfw tag
nsfwtag-footer: Message inserted below content when it contains a nsfw tag/function or sfw tag
nsfwtag-shownsfw-label: Label of a checkbox to toggle NSFW tags when previewing a page
nsfwtag-shownsfw-title: Title of a checkbox to toggle NSFW tags when previewing a page
